post:
We have low-end configurations available in Khabarovsk/Novosibirsk as well as in Finland. 

All offers below are exclusive to LET/LEB members. Some plans are hidden from the shopping page, and can only be accessed/ordered via the links below. Each VM includes a single IPv4 address and control panel access. 

**Virtual Server in Khabarovsk, Russia:**

vCPU: 1 core (2x E5-2660-v2)
Memory: 768MB DDR4
Storage: 10GB Hardware RAID 10 (6x SAS drives)
Traffic allocation: 1TB @ 1Gbps
Price: $7/month recurring.

Order link: https://xhostfire.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=134

**Virtual Server in Espoo, Finland (Uusimaa region):**

vCPU: 1 core (2x E3v5)
Memory: 1GB DDR4
Storage: 15GB Hardware RAID 10 
Traffic allocation: 1TB @ 1Gbps
Price: $7/month recurring.

Order link: https://xhostfire.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=114 with coupon **LE7OFFER**

**Virtual Server in Novosibirsk, Russia:**

vCPU: 1 core (2x E5)
Memory: 512MB DDR3
Storage: 15GB Hardware RAID 10
Traffic allocation: 2TB @ 1Gbps
IPv6 addresses on request.

Price: $7/month recurring.

Order link: https://xhostfire.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=39 (no coupon required)

**Network details:**

Novosibirsk (RU) - We colocate our own equipment in Rostelecom's DC under the network AS12389. The location provides a balance for users located East to West of Russia. 40ms to Moscow and 80ms to Japan. Test IP NSK: 95.167.6.1 / Looking glass - http://hd.ncc.snt.ru/lg
For a network map, please see https://www.company.rt.ru/en/about/net/magistr/

Khabarovsk (RU) - All major ISPs such as Rostelecom, Transtelecom, Megafon, Vimpelcom (Beeline) are connected. Average latency to Japan is 35ms. Routing is optimised to serve users worldwide.

Espoo (FI) - Local providers FNE-Finland and DNA Oy are available. Level3/Telia/ReTN transit are used.

In addition, we also offer high-performance virtual machines in Oslo, Norway at standard pricing. 

**Map of RU locations:**

![](https://i.imgur.com/PNibEeP.png)

If you have any questions, please submit a ticket at: https://xhostfire.com/contact.php

Thanks.
